This device appears to be used in.. *'''ASUS P8Z77-I DELUXE''' MB - 2T2R 802.11abgn :PCI\VEN_14E4&DEV_4359&SUBSYS_850C1043&REV_00 *'''ASUS U38D''', '''ASUS U38N''' *'''Acer Q5LJ1''' (CII PC: 11/23/2012) *'''Acer Aspire One AO576''' possibly some models :[http://www.scribd.com/doc/109301245/Manual (AO756 V5-171 manual)] *'''Acer Ezel CX''' some / all models (CII PC: 06/18/2013) :([http://www.acer.com/aspirer7/en_US/ '''Acer Aspire R7'''], [http://www.slashgear.com/acer-aspire-r7-review-14286385/ review on ''SlashGear'']) - Win8 Laptop / :convertible 'Tablet' w/ Ezel hinge and a touchscreen *'''HP Envy Phoenix''' (810-110a) *'''HP Elitebook''' (8470p) *[http://ubuntu.5.n6.nabble.com/Thinkpad-x130e-td4985421.html '''Lenovo Thinkpad E130'''] *'''Lenovo Thinkpad X140e'''
Drivers for Wi-Fi card *[http://fenvi.com/download_zx.php '''Download''']
